column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/p4591_fe65512a96a922b2bce2023b2d440dde764953d5/ for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-te
This PR is wrong. You should not update the language files directly. You must change just the source reference and then it's up to translators to do the rest in Transiflex.\n
